channel.title: Galkon's index repacking method
channel.description:
Hi there, I am trying to add Galkon's Index repacking method to my client. I got a few errors when adding to method to client.java but managed to fix all of them besides this 1. it says: "decompressors cannot be resolved" [url=http://prntscr.com/4g7kvs]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url]
Here is Galkon's thread with the method. [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/323269-index-repacking.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/323269-index-repacking.html[/url]
Any ideas on what I need to change that to?
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Galkon's index repacking method
item.dc:creator: @codyorr4 codyorr4
item.description:
@codyorr4 wrote:

Well you would begin by getting another rsps same revision different base ig.

trying that method on there, if it works retrace decompressors public integers, or class what ever that may be.

for example. when in your server or client folder top right corner click on the search box
search for decompressors, or anything related to that method, integer, or import etc.
takes like 5 mins, other times it takes an hour or more.

you’ll learn alot doing this with other things too.

Read full topic

item.title: Galkon's index repacking method
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

It does say cannot find symbol lol.
Whats my next step where would I import it?

Read full topic

item.title: Galkon's index repacking method
item.dc:creator: @codyorr4 codyorr4
item.description:
@codyorr4 wrote:

worked fine for me, along time ago anyway.

Not for sure,

maybe your missing a decompressors class, or import.

but if that was the case it would have said “could not find symbol” in class: Client.java Line:blahblah Decompressors etc.
so i doubt it. ^

search around the source for decompressors, im sure you’ll find your answer.

Read full topic
